rows.label: bf06230170_0010
rows.name: Whoa, that's a pretty lively market.

rows.label: bf06230170_0040
rows.name:
In cold Luxuria
locally grown crops barely circulate.

rows.label: bf06230170_0050
rows.name:
Just look.
All the regular shops are closed.

rows.label: bf06230170_0070
rows.name:
So that's why they procure 
like that behind the scenes.

rows.label: bf06230170_0080
rows.name:
They sell produce from other nations
at ridiculously high prices.

rows.label: bf06230170_0090
rows.name:
As long as people don't starve
that's fine, they say.

rows.label: bf06230170_0100
rows.name: The government turns a blind eye too.

rows.label: bf06230170_0110
rows.name:
So most production activities are spent on survival
and the nation's power continues to decline.

rows.label: bf06230170_0130
rows.name:
So even the wisdom of a proud ancient
civilization cannot solve all problems...

rows.label: bf06230170_0140
rows.name: Ancient civilization sounds good and all...

rows.label: bf06230170_0150
rows.name:
but basically, this place is a giant museum with
no tourists. That's not gonna feed anyone.
